Source.SQL: select jg.dizhimc diqumc, jg.dizhibm dizhibm, ertongshu.*, baby.* from ( select dizhibm,dizhimc from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc order by dizhibm @Pager ) jg left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when datediff(YEAR,cg.birthDay,getdate()) < 7 then 1 else 0 end) less7, sum(case when datediff(YEAR,cg.birthDay,getdate()) < 5 then 1 else 0 end) less5, sum(case when datediff(YEAR,cg.birthDay,getdate()) < 3 then 1 else 0 end) less3, sum(case when datediff(YEAR,cg.birthDay,getdate()) < 1 then 1 else 0 end) less0 from cc_generalinfo cg left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on cg.manaunitid = subjg.fuwujgbh where mobileflag = 1 and CONVERT(varchar(100), cg.createDate, 23) >= @登记日期Start and CONVERT(varchar(100), cg.createDate, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm order by dizhibm @Pager ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) ertongshu on jg.dizhibm = ertongshu.dizhibm left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, count(*) allcount, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,u.birthday,u.deathdate)/365.25) < 1 then 1 else 0 end) yiners, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,u.birthday,u.deathdate) >=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,u.birthday,u.deathdate) <=28 then 1 else 0 end) babys, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,u.birthday,u.deathdate)/365.25) >=1 and FLOOR(datediff(DY,u.birthday,u.deathdate)/365.25) < 4 then 1 else 0 end) childs from underfiveyearsdeathcase u left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on u.entryunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where u.mobileflag = 1 and u.status = 1 and CONVERT(varchar(100), u.createtime, 23) >= @登记日期Start and CONVERT(varchar(100), u.createtime, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm order by dizhibm @Pager ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) baby on jg.dizhibm = baby.dizhibm
Source.CountSQL: select count(*) from ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm )a
